title: !!! NZ & Aussie players Join Here !!!

embed.description: RetreatHellGaming is a Friendly, Laid back Multi PC Gaming Clan which has a competitive side, we have members from New Zealand & Australia,

body:
Retreat Hell are on the hunt for players to join our growing clan, we accept any skill level from unranked to diamond.

We are a relaxed clan but we also have a serious side for competitive gaming, our website also has free giveaways.

we also have a free to use teamspeak open to the public to use for any game, also you can create your own channel for private matches.

and if you have minecraft our fight night series are coming back.

jump onto our teamspeak for a game or a laugh. Server ip: retreathellgaming.com
